abstract.title: About these libraries
abstract.para: To provide features that are not available in thhe .NET framework by default, NHibernate use these libraries:

section.title: Castle.DynamicProxy
section.para: Component of the Castle Project used to provide dynamic proxy feature that makes possible the lazy loading of associations and collections.

section.title: HashCodeProvider
section.para: Used to call the System.Object implementation of GetHashCode() for any object (even if it is overloaded). Note that it uses IL code. Thanks to Mattias Sjogren for this library; the file HashCodeProvider.license.txt contains its license.

section.title: Iesi.Collections
section.para: Provides a type of collection missing in the .NET Framework 1.1. Read its namespace summary in NHibernate Reference for more information.
